thread.title: BREAKING: Game Of Thrones star and UK's tallest man dies of 'heart failure'
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Game Of Thrones star and UK's tallest man dies of 'heart failure'

title: BREAKING: Game Of Thrones star and UK's tallest man dies of 'heart failure'
text:
R.I.P.: Neil was the UK's tallest man 
Neil Fingleton, who was the UK's tallest man, has died at the age of 36. 
He is said to have died of heart failure on Sunday. 
Neil was 7ft 7in tall and was declared the country's tallest man in 2007. 
Mag The Mighty, whose real name was Mag Mar Tun Doh Weg, was a giant in the Game Of Thrones story. 
hbo TV STAR: Neil played Mag The Mighty The saddest television deaths Wednesday, 23rd November 2016 There are a lot of deaths on television, but we're going in for the saddest on television. These made us weep. A lot. 1 / 18 
He was called the King of the Giants and fought in Mance Rayder's army with The Wildlings. 
Mag died in season four of Game Of Thrones in the Battle of Castle Black. 
Neil was also a successful basketball player and played in America, Spain, China, Italy and Greece, as well as the UK. 
getty SPORTS STAR: Neil was a successful basketball player “To be the tallest is like a special gift, it's unique” Neil Fingleton 
Speaking to The Journal about his height in 2007, Neil said: "To be the tallest is like a special gift, it's unique. 
"I've never had any problems with my height. 
"The thing people have to understand is being exceptionally tall is not a disease — it's just a genetic thing." 
hbo GIANT KING: Mag died in the The Battle of Castle Black in seaosn foru The cast of Game of Thrones in real life Thursday, 28th April 2016 See what the amazing cast of Game of Thrones look like in real life. 1 / 10 Lena Headey as Cersei Lannister 
He also had roles in Dr Who and X-men: First Class, Avengers: Age of Ultron. 
Neil played The Fisher King in the last series of Doctor Who, opposite Peter Capaldi and Jenna Coleman. 
As well as being the tallest man in the UK, Neil was one of the 25 tallest men in the world.
